issue.title: Gazebo exiting on simulation machine in the cloud

content.raw:
This is just speculative, but the joint.sdf message makes me think of the MudPlugin, since it creates joints dynamically, which causes the joint.sdf file to be read. (There was a performance improvement in pull request #561 that would reduce these file reads, but that pull request didn't make it in time).

There's a potentially related issue #689, in which a "Too many open files" error may be generated if too many gazebo connection sockets are left open. This may not be related, but it's all I can think of right now.
